patthana24.14:1.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ
patthana24.14:1.1_1: nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
patthana24.14:2.1: Nasaraṇaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.14:3.1_0: Naaraṇaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ
patthana24.14:3.1_1: nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ nanahetuṁ
patthana24.14:3.1_2: dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo nahetu ca araṇo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā …
patthana24.14:3.1_3: tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
